thread.title: Great hotel in a convenient location
thread.title_full: Great hotel in a convenient location - Review of The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JomoMSBR
title: Great hotel in a convenient location
text: Highly recommend this little boutique hotel. It's proximity to Grand Central Station makes it accessible to all of Manhattan. The staff was very friendly. The rooms were nice and clean, and the hotel is very quiet. Definitely consider staying here if you are visiting NYC.
